welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Prairie Village, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, friendly community, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Downtown Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Downtown Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and includes check-in counters, security checkpoints, and boarding gates.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and chartered flights, with exclusive lounges and amenities for executive travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee's Summit Municipal Airport houses ticketing, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Lee's Summit Municipal Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated for handling cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
